game.name: Old West Shootout
game.description:
Do you want to be a police officer or a cop? Are you passionate about cleaning the criminals from your city? Luckily, you will get a chance to make your dream come true. A huge horde of bandits have entered the Old West Building and took its possession. You are hired as a sharp shooter by the authorized people of your city. Grab your gun and get ready to clean all the bandits from the building in Old West Shootout! Be careful while shooting as innocent civilians are also stuck there!

It will be amazing to shoot these cruel bandits and save hostage by putting your shooting skills to test in this brand new old school arcade shooter game. Your successful effort will definitely reward you with a considerable amount of cash through which you can upgrade up to 10 guns later. The best part is that each gun has some unique effect and ability to use. Once the game is finished, you will be able to know about how many bandits you have been killed, your shooting accuracy, time you have taken and how much cash you have earned so far. 

These dangerous bandits also have amazing shooting abilities, so you need to be very quick while taking them down before they do the same with you. Shoot all of them to spot the hidden items for special bonuses, while also looking forward to defeat the boss to reach the next level! The colorful graphics, old building style background and seamless gameplay supported by simple and easy controls will keep you glued to the screen for hours. Play this html5 gun 1player cowboy shooter game online for free without download!!
